titleStmt.title: Anno Domini M.DC.XXVI articles given in charge to be inquired upon and presented too, by the churchwardens, side- men, quest-men, and inquisitors in every parish within the province of Ardmagh [sic], in the course of the metropoliticall visitation of the same, in this present yeare begun, by the most reverend father in God, Iames, by the mercie of God, Lord Archbishop of Ardmagh, primate and metropolitane of all Ireland : the said presentments to be made upon their and every their corporall oathes, whereunto the parson, vicar, curate, and parish-clarke in every of the said parishes are to be assisting, so farre as they and every of them can, respectively in their knowledge or understanding.
titleStmt.author: Church of Ireland. Province of Armagh. Archbishop (1625- 1656 : Ussher)
Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: faded, with loss of text.
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
